content: Guangmou is a required Yaoguai Chief miniboss fight that you can encounter in Chapter 1 of Black Myth Wukong. Located along the main path through the Bamboo Grove, this boss is a ranged fighter who moves quickly to evade you while filling you with poison strikes.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Guangmou.md', within the main section titled 'Guangmou'.
The content is as follows:
Guangmou is a required Yaoguai Chief miniboss fight that you can encounter in Chapter 1 of Black Myth Wukong. Located along the main path through the Bamboo Grove, this boss is a ranged fighter who moves quickly to evade you while filling you with poison strikes.
